actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to impose a moratorium on the repayment of principal and interest on certain loans made by the Small Business Administration for a period of 2 years or until such time as the President determines that the United States is no longer in a period of economic recession.

summary.text: Imposes, under the Small Business Act, a moratorium on the repayment of principal and interest on specified loans made by the Small Business Administration for a period of two years or until such time as the President determines that the United States is no longer in a period of economic recession.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to impose a moratorium on the repayment of principal and interest on certain loans made by the Small Business Administration for a period of 2 years or until such time as the President determines that the United States is no longer in a period of economic recession.
